realdealdoug: You certainly have a talent for story telling, but could you help me understand the connection between accepting a gift and accepting a job that doesn't pay you what you deserve? - other than your mom told you to say no to both.
beegradehero: The drawing parallels between saying yes to a gift and saying yes to a job that wouldn't pay you was quite a stretch but all that eloquence and grace made up for it.
shreetwentyfourseven: This is so so beautiful @eishachopra . As artistes, we face it day in and out.
neal_caffery_conman: Eisha Ji, you are an incredible speaker and we all can learn a lot from your wit and wisdom. Your English is so fluent and you talk so fast. Thank you for sharing this experience. 🙏🙏
abhiandniyu: Dear Eisha, your delivery has blown me away! I don't remember the last time I've watched a sponsored video till the end. It's a brilliant piece! All hearts to you! 💪💪💪
vinay_nihal: Wow. Looking forward to more such collaborations and stories.
